theWidow:Steelweave.NAME: Steelweave

theWidow:HermitWeave.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! thewidow:Web.

theWidow:Lair.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! thewidow:Web.

theWidow:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard the first !M! un-Upgraded cards in your draw pile.

theWidow:Scrapskin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove all your debuffs. NL Permanently thewidow:Downgrade this card.

theWidow:HydraulicLimbs.NAME: Hydraulic Limbs

theWidow:Anarchy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Potion Slot{!M!|>1=s} for the rest of combat. Fill your empty potion slots with thewidow:Grenades.

theWidow:TheBigOne.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Obtain a thewidow:Mini-Nuke. NL Exhaust.
theWidow:TheBigOne.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Obtain a thewidow:Mini-Nuke+. NL Exhaust.

theWidow:Conduit.NAME: Conduit
theWidow:Conduit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thewidow:Web. NL Deal damage equal to your thewidow:Web to ALL enemies.

theWidow:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
theWidow:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you played no Attacks this turn, Retain your hand.

theWidow:SelfImprovement.NAME: Self-Improvement
theWidow:SelfImprovement.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain [E] and draw !M! card for each Upgrade on that card.
theWidow:SelfImprovement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain [E] and draw !M! cards for each Upgrade on that card.

theWidow:Lace.NAME: Lace

theWidow:Lace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose HP. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.

theWidow:BlackVenom.NAME: Black Venom

theWidow:BlackVenom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses Strength equal to the number of debuffs it has +1. NL Exhaust.

theWidow:TranscendentForm.NAME: Transcendent Form
theWidow:TranscendentForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, Transform all Status and Curse cards in your hand into Widow cards, then Upgrade all cards in your hand{!M!|2= twice}.

theWidow:TranscendentForm2.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Cards cost 0. When you draw a card, Transform it.
theWidow:TranscendentForm2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cards cost 0. When you draw a card, Transform it.

theWidow:TranscendentForm3.NAME: Transcendent Form B
theWidow:TranscendentForm3.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose 1 of 3 cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
theWidow:TranscendentForm3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose 1 of 3 Upgraded cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

theWidow:Forge.NAME: Forge

theWidow:BombLauncher.NAME: Bomb Launcher
theWidow:BombLauncher.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next {!M!|<2=Potion|@=!M! Potions} you use this turn {!M!|1=is|@=are} used twice.

theWidow:Desperation.NAME: Desperation

theWidow:GeminiBot.NAME: Gemini Bot
theWidow:GeminiBot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Unplayable. NL When you play another card in hand, play this as a {!Upgrades!|0=non-}Upgraded copy of that card and Exhaust.

theWidow:InForTheKill.NAME: In For The Kill
theWidow:InForTheKill.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. This card benefits from Vulnerable {!M!|2=twice|3=three times|4=four times}.

theWidow:Scrapper.NAME: Scrapper
theWidow:Scrapper.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block per debuff affecting you.

theWidow:MetalBurrs.NAME: Metal Burrs
theWidow:MetalBurrs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 4 times. Costs less [E] per debuff affecting you.

theWidow:Rewire.NAME: Rewire
theWidow:Rewire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Transform a card in your hand.

theWidow:Opportunist.NAME: Opportunist
theWidow:Opportunist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL If the enemy is Weak, thewidow:Sapped, or does not intend to attack, gain [E] [E] [E].

theWidow:Underfoot.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Extend the duration of Weak and Vulnerable on ALL enemies by !M! turns.

theWidow:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply 2 thewidow:Sapped for each debuff on the target.

theWidow:Distill.NAME: Distill

theWidow:SadisticIntent.NAME: Sadistic Intent

theWidow:DischargeBattery.NAME: Discharge Battery
theWidow:DischargeBattery.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with [E] remaining, spend it and apply that much thewidow:Paralysis and thewidow:Shocked to ALL enemies.

theWidow:TestSubject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply copies of one enemy's debuffs to ALL enemies.
